title: What 1970's era game show hosts are still alive as of May 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are a few that I am aware of: Peter Marshall, host of The Hollywood SquaresChuck Woolery, host of Wheel of Fortune (prior to Pat Sajak) and Love Connection, among othersBob Barker, host of The Price is RightBob Eubanks, host of The Newlywed GameTom Kennedy, host of Name That TuneWink Martindale, host of Gambit and Tic-Tac-Dough (thank you, Carolynn Crowe-Payne, for reminding me of him)
